author: Deleted User
content: Hey guys, Im sorry if its the wrong place to ask this, but why do uncle blocks rewarded in ethereum blockchain, but orphaned blocks on bitcoin are not rewarded. Im looking to learn a bit more on this

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content: eth has 13-15 second block time, bitcoin has 10 minute. its possible for eth miners to accidentally mine uncles due to a few seconds of communication latency, so they are also rewarded to smooth variability in rewards. not so for bitcoin miners

author: djrtwo
content: that is a target and is a parameter set in a mining protocol. mining is a poission process around that target. Bitcoin has variable block time as well
